sections.title: Instructions
sections.markdown:
- Set aside about 5 minutes in a quiet spot.
- Use short phrases; complete sentences are optional.
- If a prompt does not fit, skip it and move on.
- Read once, then pick one idea to try.

sections.title: Client worksheet
sections.markdown:
### Grounding in the present
#### Key points
- Use the senses to anchor attention.
- Slow breathing helps reset the body.

#### Try this week
- Try a 5-4-3-2-1 scan.
- Pair with a slow exhale.

sections.title: Clinician notes
sections.markdown:
- Draft-only, clinician review required.
- Invite the client to share highlights in session and reinforce skill use.
- Invite the client to choose one experiment for the week.
- Link the handout to treatment goals and progress tracking.
